Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o13 pages, 2 figures. V6: Added additional remarks on the mathematical work of Marie Torhorst. Summary of previous versions: V5 - Updated the article by adding a historical note. V4 - Final preprint prior to publication.
V3 - Proof of the Ursell-Young theorem and illustrations added.V2 - The original short note was expanded to a full article. V1 - originalshort note\u00a7r
